title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 4216 - Pool Calculations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 4216 - Pool Calculations

State Regulations
§ 4216.1 - Pools - calculation and distribution
§ 4216.6 - Parlay betting

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 4216

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 101, 227, 405; L. 1970, ch. 1023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
